mapeditor

Class MapEditor

  • java.lang.Object
    • javafx.application.Application
      • mapeditor.MapEditor

  • public class MapEditor
extends javafx.application.Application
    MapEditor class displays a stand alone application allowing one to create and edit map files. This should display the map being edited in a top-down graphical fashion, allowing the user to add and remove items.
    Author:
    oliviamorrison

        Returns:
